channel.title: What new console games you looking forward to?
channel.description: Personally i was looking forward to fifa 12, but on the trailer makes it seem like fifa 11 so not that much excited as i was last year, the new cod doesnt excite me either considering i didn't play black ops as much as i thought i would, 10th prestige every other cod except this one. I play xbox 360 btw and never liked GOW maybe i should sell it :P thoughts?

item.title: What new console games you looking forward to?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

MW3 and GOW3 can both suck my dick. Both of those series are horrible.

Read full topic

item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“mcbeans, post:46, topic:408948”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=510230.msg3703579#msg3703579 date=1312904978]

I enjoyed the fable games 1-2 never played what ever skyrim is or fallout, i had a quick play on oblivion and hated the thing. I would wish a new GTA which is actually more gangish and more realistic, anyone no if there is going to be one???
[/quote]Fable tlc was the best fable 2 was alright and fable three sucked balls. there making a new fable for the kinect called the journy. and what did you hate about oblivion?

says the person who plays rsc[/quote]Whats that suppose to mean?

item.title: What new console games you looking forward to?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:42, topic:408948”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=510230.msg3703150#msg3703150 date=1312865602]

To all skyrim fanboys, it will probably be bad. Oblivion was a pile of turd, and considering that they are dumbing it down even more for this release, i expect massive fail.

What would you say is the best one then?
[/quote]Morrowind and Daggerfall are a close tie, i can’t really choose one.[/quote]

Oblivion wasn’t too great. I enjoyed Fallout 3 a lot, although New Vegas wasn’t too impressive. Morrowind was pretty awesome, especially with the high definition graphic mods, never played Daggerfall, though.

Read full topic
